meanings.definition: A small scale model or rough draft of an unfinished sculpture or architectural design.
meanings.sent1: The artist created a maquette of the building before starting the actual construction.
meanings.sent2: The architect presented a maquette of the new museum to the board for approval.
meanings.sent3: The maquette of the sculpture looked like a tiny version of the final masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her desk was a maquette of organized chaos, with papers and pens scattered in a deliberate pattern.
meanings.sent5: The maquette of the city skyline was so detailed, it almost looked real.
